Description: To provide assistance to inspection activities of vehicles according to the established policies and procedures set at the centre, in order to ensure compliance with road traffic safety and applied regulations. Assist the Light Vehicle Inspector evaluating observed faults and report the same according the set operation guidelines in order to ensure accuracy in assessment. Identify opportunities for continuous improvement of systems, processes and practices taking into account ‘international leading practice’, improvement of business processes, cost reduction and productivity improvement.Skills
Skills: 2-4 years’ experience in the automotive / vehicle inspection field as a mechanic/vehicle inspection
Technical / Trade certificate or equivalent in automotive field
